mapper.select: SELECT C.C_ID, C.B_ID, C.M_ID, M.M_NAME, C.C_CONTENT, C.C_CREATE_DATE FROM AC_COMMENT C, AC_MEMBER M WHERE C.M_ID = M.M_ID AND B_ID = #{b_id} GROUP BY C.C_ID, C.B_ID, C.M_ID, M.M_NAME, C.C_CONTENT, C.C_CREATE_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AC_COMMENT(C_ID, B_ID, M_ID, C_CONTENT, C_CREATE_DATE) VALUES(COMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{b_id}, #{m_id}, #{c_content}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))
